mapper.select: SELECT d.diary_id, d.user_id, d.diary_title, dt.diary_text, dt.create_time, u.nickname FROM llpyblog.diary AS d LEFT JOIN llpyblog.diary_text AS dt on d.diary_id = dt.diary_id left join llpyblog.`user` as u on d.user_id = u.user_id where d.is_open = 0

SELECT d.diary_id, d.user_id, d.diary_title, dt.diary_text, u.nickname, dt.create_time FROM llpyblog.diary AS d LEFT JOIN llpyblog.diary_text AS dt on d.diary_id = dt.diary_id left join llpyblog.`user` as u on d.user_id = u.user_id where d.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT d.diary_id, dt.diary_text FROM llpyblog.diary AS d LEFT JOIN llpyblog.diary_text AS dt ON d.diary_id = dt.diary_id WHERE d.diary_id = #{diaryId}
